dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset consists of 60,000 training and 10,000 test examples of handwritten digits, which have been size-normalized to 28Ã—28 pixel grayscale images and centered by pixel mass.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: P. J. Grother
dcterms:description: The NIST SD19 dataset comprises 344,307 training and 58,646 test samples of handwritten digits and 387,361 training and 23,941 test samples of handwritten characters, used for digit and case-sensitive character recognition.
dcterms:title: NIST SD19
